value:
No matter the age, it is unchanging.
The hearts of men conceal hatred
and evil intent.

They feigned weakness and we lent
them our strength. Before long, they
became conceited. That is mankind!

Who or what are you? Do you know
the answer to this question?

Dragons will retake the world.
Dolhr is a torch to light the path
I am forging.

The dragons of this realm will hear
my call. Our time will come...

An opportunity to emerge from my
confines? This is agreeable.

Take this to heart... So long as there
is light, the darkness shall never fade.

Fools...be consumed by the flames
of hell!

Yes... Come to me! I will cast you into
the deepest pit of hell!
Such caprice.

Men call me the Shadow Dragon and
cower before me. Hear me, dragons
all! It is time to reclaim what is ours!

Do you think to regard me?$k$pIn fairness, I have been observing
your little act.$k$pFlaunting power unsuited to you with
wild abandon. Playing lead in a farce
about a fool who flies too high...$k$pDragons were asked to discard their
power. Mankind was not grateful.
You suggest I accept that?$k$pNaga's charity was wasted on these
hearts, so far beyond redemption. O
cursed creature, man!$k$pSomeday, the heart of the inferno will
open upon them! The world will be
remade—no, restored!
はあっ
でやあっ
ぐっ…
impudent
Foolish mortals!
Suffer, and die!
Think you can defeat me?
Burn in the pits of hell!
How could this happen?
measured/confident last boss chuckle
I am Medeus, king of the Earth Dragons.
Do you tempt my wrath?
Foolish human! You dare disturb my slumber?
Marth... Ah, yes... Anri's descendant. A troublesome one.
As long as there is light...the darkness will never be extinguished!
You'll find an Earth Dragon like me harder to tame than Gharnef, weakling...
I will show you the true power of the Earth Dragons. You should be thankful!
You dare?
Hmm...
Take YOUR position.
